title: De 1 hasta n

content: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { int n; cin >> n; int divs = 0; for (int i = 2; i <= sqrt(n); i++) { divs += ( n % i == 0 ); } if(divs) { cout << n << " no es primo\n"; } else { cout << n << " es primo\n"; } return 0; }
title: Es primo

title: Impares

content: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { int n; cin >> n; for (int i = 1; i <= n / 2; i++) { cout << 2 * i << "\n"; } return 0; }
title: Pares

content: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { int levels; cin >> levels; for(int level = 1; level <= levels; level++) { for(int espacios = 1; espacios <= (levels - level); espacios++) { cout << " "; } for(int aster = 1; aster <= (2*level - 1); aster++) { cout << "* "; } cout << "\n"; } }
title: Piramide

content: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { int levels; cin >> levels; for(int level = 1; level <= levels; level++) { for(int aster = 1; aster <= level; aster++) { cout << "* "; } cout << "\n"; } }
title: Triangulo

content: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { int levels; cin >> levels; for(int level = levels; level > 0; level--) { for(int aster = 1; aster <= level; aster++) { cout << "* "; } cout << "\n"; } }
title: Triangulo invertido
